alert.note: Alert for East Marshall; Lake Of The Woods; North Beltrami; Roseau (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 3:44PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Marshall, southeastern Roseau, northwestern Beltrami and western Lake of the Woods Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 344 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Wannaska, or 14 miles south of Roseau, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wannaska, Hayes Lake State Park, Pencer, Casperson, Skime and Torfin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Marshall; Lake Of The Woods; North Beltrami; Roseau
